articles.author: Fenit Nirappil
articles.title: Uproar over surgeon general pick exposes MAHA factions among RFK Jr. allies - The Washington Post
articles.description: Casey Means, a prominent nutrition advocate in the Make America Healthy Again movement, has been described as insufficiently critical of vaccines.
articles.content: The backlash to President Donald Trumps new surgeon general nominee, an ally of Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., has exposed divisions in the nascent Make America Healthy Ag… [+8482 chars]
